title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Opportunities to build new or strengthen existing career-related relationships surface. Although its natural to want to be respected, be careful of appearing too self-contained today. Instead, allow your innate curiosity and genuine delight in common goals guide your trajectory. A creative collaboration can lead to a lasting partnership. Working side by side with someone else causes you to grow in ways you dont yet know. Author Dale Carnegie wrote, You can make more friends in two months by becoming interested in other people than you can in two years by trying to get other people interested in you. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
